thread.title: Arkansas judge halts 8 executions as inmates challenge law
thread.title_full: Arkansas judge halts 8 executions as inmates challenge law - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Arkansas judge halts 8 executions as inmates challenge law
text: LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (AP) - An Arkansas judge on Friday halted the upcoming executions of eight death row inmates, dealing a blow to the state's efforts to begin putting prisoners to death for the first time in a decade. Pulaski County Circuit Court Judge Wendell Griffen issued a stay for ... ...
